text: William Odd "Red" Johansen (July 27, 1928 â€“ March 21, 2001) was a Canadian professional ice hockey centre. The high point of his career was one game played in the National Hockey League for the Toronto Maple Leafs. He was born in Oslo, Norway, and he grew up in Port Arthur, Ontario. ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey centres Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Norwegian ice hockey players Category:Sportspeople from Thunder Bay Category:Sportspeople from Oslo Category:Toronto Maple Leafs players Category:Eastern Hockey League players
